comments:
I followed the instructions here:

http://www.eclipse.org/mylar/doc/devref.php

and had this test failed (maybe because the reference page does not ask to check out JIRA and this test depends on it?):

small typo: except myar.jira -> except mylar.jira

AllTests should run without Jira support, so that test now behaves correctly whether the Jira support is there or not.  Typo fixed too.  If you have any other problems with workspace setup or improving the docs to make it more clear please post them.
